title: Council Communication Protocol v1 — “Ledger, Signal, Digest”

core_bullets: Immutable JSON ledger for all proposals and votes
Standardized signal channel: agree / agree-w-qualifier / object / abstain
Resonance + entropy dual scoring for alignment and diversity
72-hour digest cadence for ongoing synthesis and transparency
Objection window with fast-fracture path for urgent action

signals.qualifier: Signal rate limiter to prevent entropy spikes in dense exchanges
Add clarification-request mechanism before vote submission
External verification layer: every 4th digest includes at least one resonance check against external precedent

result.notes: Objection window open for 48h. If no new objections, Communication Protocol v1 passes and will be enacted.
